comments.raw_text:
We're slower than Chrome at http://vvvvjs.quasipartikel.at/, and the site advises Firefox users to switch to Chrome as a result.

This is probably JavaScript related, but I haven't profiled yet.

comments.text: There's a significant amount on Cairo, but this is indeed mostly the method JIT.

comments.raw_text: How do you measure the slowness, anyway? The animation looks less smooth in Fx to me, but it's hard to tell. I tried JM+TI and I couldn't really tell if that was different, either. But I'd like to know.
comments.creator: dmandelin@mozilla.com
comments.text: How do you measure the slowness, anyway? The animation looks less smooth in Fx to me, but it's hard to tell. I tried JM+TI and I couldn't really tell if that was different, either. But I'd like to know.

comments.raw_text: I wonder when the site decided to add that advice -- maybe before FF4 came out?  This could be an evangelism issue.

comments.raw_text: If you click on "Graphics" and then try to scroll down and up, the UI feels laggy in Firefox Aurora. In Chrome 15 it works well.
